questions.question: Order the words to make a sentence. Nervous / if I / get /coffee I / usually /drink

choices.answer: If I drink coffee, I usually get nervous.
If usually get nervous, I drink coffee.
Ifusually nervous, I get  drink coffee.

questions.question: Choose the correct option to complete the sentence: If you drink alcoholic beverages, __________.

choices.answer: drivescarefully.
don’t drive.

questions.question: Choose the correct option to write the verbs to complete the sentence: If my husband _____(cook), he ____(burn) the food

choices.answer: If my husband cook, he burn the food.
If my husband cooks, he burn the food.
If my husband cooks, he burns the food.

questions.question: What is the structure of the first conditional?

choices.answer: If + simple present + simple present
If + simple past + present conditional or present continuous condi
If + simple present + simple future

questions.question: Choose the correct option to complete the sentence: If they do the homework, __________.

choices.answer: I would take them to the movies.
I will take them to the movies.

questions.question: Order the words to make a sentence. You/ you'll be/ tonight if/ work/ tired /all day

choices.answer: You'll be tired tonight if you work all day.
Youwork tonight if you'll be tired all day.
If you'll be tired all day you work tonight

questions.question: What is the correct way to write the sentence? If I would have 500 dollars to sspend, I would buy an electric guitar

choices.answer: If I will had 500 dollars to spend, I would buy an electric guitar
If I have 500 dollars to spend, I would buy an electric guitar.
If I had 500 dollars to spend, I would buy an electric guitar.

questions.question: Which conditional does it belong the sentence ?  If we found a bag full of money, we would return it to the owner

choices.answer: Second condicional
Zero condicional
First condicional

questions.question: Choose the correct option to complete the sentence: ____________, I wouldn’t cheat on the test.

choices.answer: If we met a famous actor.
If we found a bag full of money.
If I were you.

questions.question: What sentence is written with the structure of the third conditional?

choices.answer: She would be a great mother if she had children.
If I had enough money, I would have bought you a house.
If you study, you will pass the exam.
